name: DiffuseParenchymalLungDisease
title: Diffuse Parenchymal Lung Disease
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts related to a diagnosis of diffuse parenchymal lung disease.),(Data Element Scope: This value set would use the Diagnosis QDM category.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set contains concepts related to diffuse lung parenchymal diseases with either an undocumented cause or which could have been caused by a specific substance or drug.),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set excludes concepts that specify other causes of diffuse parenchymal lung disease.)
